H0.text: It has a nice surface is a fact about the rock that a student observes when examining its different characteristics.

H1.text: It has an interesting shape is a fact about the rock that a student observes different characteristics of.

H2.text: It is made of several layers is the observation that best describes a fact about the rock that a student observes different characteristics of.

H3.text: It feels warm when touched is the observation that best describes a fact about the rock.

A4.text: Sedimentary rocks are laid down in layers called beds or strata.
